fact.description: The match has started at Arena Pernambuco.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Ball safe as Ivory Coast is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Japan throw-in in Ivory Coast's half.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ivory Coast's half?
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Corner awarded to Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Japan.
Japan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Japan at Arena Pernambuco.
Ivory Coast push forward at Arena Pernambuco and Gervinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Japan defence.
Corner awarded to Ivory Coast.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a throw-in for Ivory Coast, close to Japan's area.
Throw-in for Japan in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ivory Coast goal kick.
Throw-in Japan.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Can Japan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ivory Coast's half?
Yuto Nagatomo instrumental with a fine assist.
Ivory Coast needs to be cautious. Japan have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Japan.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Japan throw-in in Ivory Coast's half.
Ivory Coast awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ivory Coast's half?
Japan's Atsuto Uchida gets in a shot on goal at Arena Pernambuco. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Atsuto Uchida (Japan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Ball safe as Ivory Coast is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast.
Maya Yoshida (Japan) has received a yellow card from Enrique Roberto Osses.
Ivory Coast are coming forward and Yaya Toure gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Japan at Arena Pernambuco.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast in their own half.
Ivory Coast are pushing forward but Salomon Kalou's finish is wide of the goal.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Japan a goal kick.
Throw-in for Japan at Arena Pernambuco.
Throw-in Japan.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast.
Yaya Toure of Ivory Coast gets in a strike, but is off target.
Japan have a goal kick.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Japan a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast in their own half.
Ball safe as Ivory Coast is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Recife, Gervinho of Ivory Coast is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Ivory Coast.
In Recife Ivory Coast drive forward through Arthur Boka. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ivory Coast drive forward but Wilfried Bony is judged offside.
Important block from the Ivory Coast defence as Keisuke Honda fires in a strike for Japan.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Throw-in for Japan at Arena Pernambuco.
Can Ivory Coast get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Japan's half?
Free kick Japan.
Ivory Coast's Gervinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Japan defender.
Ivory Coast's Wilfried Bony misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Japan throw-in in Ivory Coast's half.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Recife, Salomon Kalou (Ivory Coast) misses the target with a header.
Japan have a goal kick.
Japan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ivory Coast's Salomon Kalou gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Japan defender.
Ivory Coast awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Arthur Boka of Ivory Coast smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Enrique Roberto Osses will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the first half.
Goal kick for Ivory Coast at Arena Pernambuco.
Ivory Coast awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivory Coast attack but Wilfried Bony's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Japan at Arena Pernambuco.
Throw-in Japan.
Free kick Japan.
Japan's Makoto Hasebe breaks free at Arena Pernambuco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ivory Coast goal kick.
Japan's Makoto Hasebe misses with an attempt on goal.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Ivory Coast a goal kick.
Salomon Kalou for Ivory Coast is whistled offside.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Japan.
Free kick Japan.
Ivory Coast's Sol Bamba has been booked in Recife.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Alberto Zaccheroni is making the team's first substitution at Arena Pernambuco with Yasuhito Endo replacing Makoto Hasebe.
The match in Recife is underway once more.
The match at Arena Pernambuco has been interrupted briefly for a check on Arthur Boka, who is down injured.
Arthur Boka returns to the field for Ivory Coast after picking up a slight injury.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ivory Coast's half?
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Ivory Coast throw-in in Japan's half.
Japan have a goal kick.
Didier Zokora (Ivory Coast) has received a first yellow card.
Ivory Coast awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivory Coast are pushing forward but Salomon Kalou's finish is wide of the goal.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Japan a goal kick.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Japan have a goal kick.
Didier Drogba is replacing Die Serey for Ivory Coast at Arena Pernambuco.
Ivory Coast drive upfield and Gervinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Japan defender.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast.
Masato Morishige for Japan has been booked by Enrique Roberto Osses and receives a first yellow card.
Great play from Serge Aurier to set up the goal.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
That's a fine assist from Serge Aurier.
Japan make their second substitution with Yoshito Okubo replacing Yuya Osako.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Japan at Arena Pernambuco.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Attention is being given to Ivory Coast’s Arthur Boka and play has been suspended briefly.
Enrique Roberto Osses has blown to resume play in Recife.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Enrique Roberto Osses blows against Japan's Atsuto Uchida for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast at Arena Pernambuco.
Throw-in for Japan close to the penalty box.
Sabri Lamouchi (Ivory Coast) is making a second change, with Constant Djakpa replacing the possibly injured Arthur Boka.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Ivory Coast throw-in in Japan's half.
Ivory Coast are coming forward and Yaya Toure gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Japan at Arena Pernambuco.
Ivory Coast have a goal kick.
Didier Ya Konan is on a sub for Wilfried Bony for Ivory Coast.
Free kick Ivory Coast.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Japan a goal kick.
Ivory Coast's Didier Drogba is on target but unsuccessful.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Ball safe as Ivory Coast is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Ivory Coast.
Didier Drogba (Ivory Coast) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Ivory Coast's Gervinho has run offside.
Yoichiro Kakitani is on a sub for Shinji Kagawa for Japan.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Ivory Coast a goal kick.
Free kick Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast drive forward and Salomon Kalou gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Corner awarded to Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
At Arena Pernambuco the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the second half.
Can Ivory Coast get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Japan's half?
Throw-in for Japan in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Recife to check on Didier Ya Konan, who is grimacing with pain.
Play has been resumed at Arena Pernambuco.
Didier Ya Konan for Ivory Coast is back on the field again.
Can Ivory Coast get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Japan's half?
Throw-in Japan.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Ivory Coast throw-in in Japan's half.
Didier Ya Konan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The match is underway again.
Enrique Roberto Osses blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
